title: NATO chief pitches monthly billions on weapons for Kiev
description: NATO should be paying €1 billion a month to buy US weapons for Ukraine, NATO Secretary-General Mark Rutte has claimed Read Full Article at RT.com
content:
NATO countries should spend at least €1 billion ($1.17 billion) a month on weapons for Ukraine next year, the military bloc’s secretary-general, Mark Rutte, has claimed. 
The call comes amid US-medi… [+1783 chars]
